name: Black Magick (Unreleased)
description:
Our world is in a terrible place. Magick has been made illegal and it's practitioners have been hunted to near extinction, the Gods have all but forsaken the land, and the Daedra's forces have been spotted approaching from the south. Eryte is in danger, and only one person can save it, one child can save it. Will he prevail against the unbeatable odds to save the world, or let is slip into darkness once and for all?`

Learn Magick, fight your way through the demonic legions, uncover the hidden secrets of the divines, and ultimately drive the fate of the world.
